fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: This title will be displayed above the introduction text.

fields.name: introduction
fields.label: Introduction text
fields.description: This text will be displayed before the quiz starts.

fields.name: backgroundImage
fields.label: Background image
fields.description: An optional background image for the introduction.

name: backgroundImage
label: Background image
description: An optional background image for the Question set.

name: passPercentage
label: Pass percentage
description: Percentage of Total score required for passing the quiz.

fields.name: textualProgress
fields.label: Progress text
fields.description: Text used if textual progress is selected.

fields.name: message
fields.label: Feedback heading
fields.description: This heading will be displayed at the end of the quiz when the user has answered all questions.

fields.name: scoreString
fields.label: Score display text
fields.description: Text used to display Total user score. "@score" will be replaced by calculated score, "@total" will be replaced by maximum possible score.

fields.name: successGreeting
fields.label: Quiz passed greeting
fields.description: This text will be displayed above the score if the user has successfully passed the quiz.

fields.name: successComment
fields.label: Passed comment
fields.description: This comment will be displayed after the score if the user has successfully passed the quiz.

fields.name: failGreeting
fields.label: Quiz failed title
fields.default: You did not pass this time.
fields.description: This text will be displayed above the score if the user has failed the quiz.

fields.name: failComment
fields.label: Failed comment
fields.description: This comment will be displayed after the score if the user has failed the quiz.

fields.name: successVideo
fields.label: Passed video
fields.description: This video will be played if the user successfully passed the quiz.

fields.name: failVideo
fields.label: Fail video
fields.description: This video will be played if the user failes the quiz.

name: override
label: Settings for "Show solution" button and "Retry".
description: These options will let you override when to display "Show solution" button and "Retry" in integrated h5p content.

fields.name: overrideButtons
fields.label: Enable override for "Show solution" and "Retry" settings.
fields.description: If this is enabled the questions own settings will be ignored and the below settings will be used instead.

fields.name: overrideShowSolutionButton
fields.label: Enable "Show solution" buttons.
fields.description: Enabling this option will make questions show the "Show solution" button.

fields.name: overrideRetry
fields.label: Enable "Retry".
fields.description: Enabling this option will make the user able to "Retry" .
